heading: English language. Influence on foreign languages.
alt-heading: Influence of English on foreign languages.
general-note: Here are entered works on the influence of the English language on foreign languages in general. Works on the influence of the English language on a specific language or group of languages are entered under. English language--Influence on [language influenced],. with an additional subject entry under. [language influenced]--Foreign elements--English,. e.g.. 1. English language--Influence on French.  2. French language--Foreign elements--English..
